house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1980 has 3 bedroom(s), 3 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Bidet, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings,Dishwasher, Garage Door Opener, Great Room, Kitchen Island, Microwave,Spanish Style, Tennis Court(s), Trash Compacter, Wet Bar
